poem:
Title: "Trade Winds"

Bargains on the Bosphorus stir,
Brexit-born, pursue the lure
of Turkish promise, commerce pure.
Britain treads the path obscure.

O'er chartered seas, past geopolitics,
In boardrooms, where the digits mix,
In market's stream, hope transfix,
Titans of trade, their lore affix.

Quick silvered tongues vow prosperity,
Under austere OECD's sanctity.
Alas, 'twixt fact and expectation's disparity,
There lies the enigma of nationality.
